amendment.description: To clarify that student loan repayment assistance does not violate section 209 of title 18, United States Code relating to Federal salary.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3239 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3239 proposed by Senator Mikulski for Senator Kennedy. (consideration: CR S12852; text: CR S12852) To clarify that student loan repayment assistance does not violate section 209 of title 18, United States Code relating to Federal salary.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3239 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3239 proposed by Senator Mikulski for Senator Kennedy.
